articles.description: A Bunnings Warehouse in the Far North and a pharmacy in Tauranga are the latest locations of interest linked to the Covid-19 Delta outbreak on Friday, while an Asian supermarket in Tauranga has been added as a high-risk location of interest.

articles.title: Singapore boasts 6 spots on World's 50 Best Bars 2021 list - CNA
articles.description: London's Connaught Bar is the world's best, while Jigger & Pony is Singapore's only entry in the Top 10 at No 9. Atlas lost its The Best Bar in Asia title, which it had held for two years.
articles.content:
